sentences.sContent: I cannot stand his gaucherie any more.
sentences.sContent_eng: I cannot stand his gaucherie any more.
sentences.sCn: 我再也无法忍受他的无礼。

sentences.sContent: First love is a little gaucherie with a lot of curious.
sentences.sContent_eng: First love is a little gaucherie with a lot of curious.
sentences.sCn: 初恋就是一点点笨拙外加许许多多好奇。
